verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things the LORD <S%G2962><s%> appointed <S%G322><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> seventy <S%G1440><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> and sent <S%G649><s%> them two <S%G1417><s%> and two before <S%G4253><s%> his face <S%G4383><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> and place, <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> he himself <S%G846><s%> would <S%G3195><s%> come. <S%G2064><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to them, The harvest <S%G2326><s%> truly <S%G3303><s%> is great, <S%G4183><s%> but the laborers <S%G2040><s%> are few: <S%G3641><s%> pray <S%G1189><s%> you therefore the Lord <S%G2962><s%> of the harvest, <S%G2326><s%> that he would send <S%G1544><s%> forth <S%G1544><s%> laborers <S%G2040><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his harvest. <S%G2326><s%>
Go <S%G4198><s%> your ways: behold, <S%G2400><s%> I send <S%G649><s%> you forth <S%G649><s%> as lambs <S%G704><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3319><s%> wolves. <S%G3074><s%>

Carry <S%G941><s%> neither <S%G3361><s%> purse, <S%G905><s%> nor <S%G3361><s%> money, <S%G4082><s%> nor <S%G3361><s%> shoes: <S%G5266><s%> and salute <S%G782><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> man <S%G3367><s%> by the way. <S%G3598><s%>

And into <S%G1519><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> you enter, <S%G1525><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> say, <S%G3004><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> be to this <S%G5129><s%> house. <S%G3624><s%>

And if <S%G1437><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> be there, <S%G1563><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> shall rest <S%G1879><s%> on it: if <S%G1490><s%> not, it shall turn <S%G344><s%> to you again. <S%G344><s%>

And in the same <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> remain, <S%G3306><s%> eating <S%G2068><s%> and drinking <S%G4095><s%> such things as they give: <S%G3844><s%> for the laborer <S%G2040><s%> is worthy <S%G514><s%> of his hire. <S%G3408><s%> Go <S%G3327><s%> not from house <S%G3614><s%> to house. <S%G3614><s%>

And into <S%G1519><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> you enter, <S%G1525><s%> and they receive <S%G1209><s%> you, eat <S%G2068><s%> such things as are set <S%G3908><s%> before <S%G3908><s%> you:

And heal <S%G2323><s%> the sick <S%G772><s%> that are therein, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%> and say <S%G3004><s%> to them, The kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is come <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to you.

But into <S%G1519><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> city <S%G4172><s%> you enter, <S%G1525><s%> and they receive <S%G1209><s%> you not, go <S%G1831><s%> your ways out into <S%G1519><s%> the streets <S%G4113><s%> of the same, <S%G846><s%> and say, <S%G2036><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> the very dust <S%G2868><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> city, <S%G4172><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> sticks <S%G2853><s%> on us, we do wipe <S%G631><s%> off <S%G631><s%> against you: notwithstanding <S%G4133><s%> be you sure <S%G1097><s%> of this, <S%G5124><s%> that the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is come <S%G1448><s%> near <S%G1448><s%> to you.
But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that it shall be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> in that day <S%G2250><s%> for Sodom, <S%G4670><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for that city. <S%G4172><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Chorazin! <S%G5523><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> to you, Bethsaida! <S%G966><s%> for if <S%G1487><s%> the mighty <S%G1411><s%> works had been done <S%G1096><s%> in Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon, <S%G4605><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> have been done <S%G1096><s%> in you, they had a great <S%G3819><s%> while ago <S%G3819><s%> repented, <S%G3340><s%> sitting <S%G2521><s%> in sackcloth <S%G4526><s%> and ashes. <S%G4700><s%>
But it shall be more <S%G414><s%> tolerable <S%G414><s%> for Tyre <S%G5184><s%> and Sidon <S%G4605><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the judgment, <S%G2920><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> for you.
And you, Capernaum, <S%G2584><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are exalted <S%G5312><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> shall be thrust <S%G2601><s%> down <S%G2601><s%> to hell. <S%G86><s%>

He that hears <S%G191><s%> you hears <S%G191><s%> me; and he that despises <S%G114><s%> you despises <S%G114><s%> me; and he that despises <S%G114><s%> me despises <S%G114><s%> him that sent <S%G649><s%> me.

And the seventy <S%G1440><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> again <S%G5290><s%> with joy, <S%G5479><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the devils <S%G1140><s%> are subject <S%G5293><s%> to us through <S%G1722><s%> your name. <S%G3686><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, I beheld <S%G2334><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> as lightning <S%G796><s%> fall <S%G4098><s%> from heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I give <S%G1325><s%> to you power <S%G1849><s%> to tread <S%G3961><s%> on <S%G1883><s%> serpents <S%G3789><s%> and scorpions, <S%G4651><s%> and over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of the enemy: <S%G2190><s%> and nothing <S%G3762><s%> shall by any <S%G3364><s%> means <S%G3364><s%> hurt <S%G91><s%> you.

Notwithstanding <S%G4133><s%> in this <S%G5129><s%> rejoice <S%G5463><s%> not, that the spirits <S%G4151><s%> are subject <S%G5293><s%> to you; but rather <S%G3123><s%> rejoice, <S%G5463><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are written <S%G1125><s%> in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

In that hour <S%G5610><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rejoiced <S%G21><s%> in spirit, <S%G4151><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> I thank <S%G1843><s%> you, O Father, <S%G3962><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth, <S%G1093><s%> that you have hid <S%G613><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things from the wise <S%G4680><s%> and prudent, <S%G4908><s%> and have revealed <S%G601><s%> them to babes: <S%G3516><s%> even <S%G3483><s%> so, <S%G3488><s%> Father; <S%G3962><s%> for so <S%G3779><s%> it seemed <S%G1096><s%> <S%G2107><s%> good in your sight. <S%G1715><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> things are delivered <S%G3860><s%> to me of my Father: <S%G3962><s%> and no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> is, but the Father; <S%G3962><s%> and who <S%G5101><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> is, but the Son, <S%G5207><s%> and he to whom <S%G3739><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> will <S%G1014><s%> reveal <S%G601><s%> him.

And he turned <S%G4762><s%> him to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> privately, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> are the eyes <S%G3788><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> see <S%G991><s%> the things that you see: <S%G991><s%>

For I tell <S%G3004><s%> you, that many <S%G4183><s%> prophets <S%G4396><s%> and kings <S%G935><s%> have desired <S%G2309><s%> to see <S%G1492><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> you see, <S%G991><s%> and have not seen <S%G1492><s%> them; and to hear <S%G191><s%> those things which <S%G3739><s%> you hear, <S%G191><s%> and have not heard <S%G191><s%> them.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> lawyer <S%G3544><s%> stood <S%G450><s%> up, and tempted <S%G1598><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Master, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%> to inherit <S%G2816><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life? <S%G2222><s%>
He said <S%G2036><s%> to him, What <S%G5101><s%> is written <S%G1125><s%> in the law? <S%G3551><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> read <S%G314><s%> you?

And he answering <S%G611><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> You shall love <S%G25><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> with all <S%G3650><s%> your heart, <S%G2588><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your soul, <S%G5590><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your strength, <S%G2479><s%> and with all <S%G3650><s%> your mind; <S%G1271><s%> and your neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as yourself. <S%G4572><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, You have answered <S%G611><s%> right: <S%G3723><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> do, <S%G4160><s%> and you shall live. <S%G2198><s%>
But he, willing <S%G2309><s%> to justify <S%G1344><s%> himself, <S%G1438><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> And who <S%G5101><s%> is my neighbor? <S%G4139><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G5274><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> A certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G444><s%> went <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> from Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> to Jericho, <S%G2410><s%> and fell <S%G4045><s%> among <S%G4045><s%> thieves, <S%G3027><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> stripped <S%G1562><s%> him of his raiment, and wounded <S%G4127><s%> <S%G2007><s%> him, and departed, <S%G565><s%> leaving <S%G863><s%> him half <S%G2253><s%> dead. <S%G2253><s%>

And by chance <S%G4795><s%> there came <S%G2597><s%> down a certain <S%G5100><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> that way: <S%G3598><s%> and when he saw <S%G1492><s%> him, he passed <S%G492><s%> by on the other <S%G492><s%> side. <S%G492><s%>

And likewise <S%G3668><s%> a Levite, <S%G3019><s%> when he was at <S%G2596><s%> the place, <S%G5117><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> and looked <S%G1492><s%> on him, and passed <S%G492><s%> by on the other <S%G492><s%> side. <S%G492><s%>

But a certain <S%G5100><s%> Samaritan, <S%G4541><s%> as he journeyed, <S%G3593><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> where <S%G2596><s%> he was: and when he saw <S%G1492><s%> him, he had compassion <S%G4697><s%> on him,

And went <S%G4334><s%> to him, and bound <S%G2611><s%> up his wounds, <S%G5134><s%> pouring in oil <S%G1637><s%> and wine, <S%G3631><s%> and set <S%G1913><s%> him on <S%G1909><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> beast, <S%G2934><s%> and brought <S%G71><s%> him to an inn, <S%G3829><s%> and took <S%G1959><s%> care <S%G1959><s%> of him.

And on <S%G1909><s%> the morrow <S%G839><s%> when he departed, <S%G1831><s%> he took <S%G1544><s%> out two <S%G1417><s%> pence, <S%G1220><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> them to the host, <S%G3830><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Take care <S%G1959><s%> of him; and whatever <S%G3748><s%> <S%G302><s%> you spend <S%G4325><s%> more, <S%G4325><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> I come <S%G1880><s%> again, <S%G1880><s%> I will repay <S%G591><s%> you.

Which <S%G5101><s%> now <S%G3767><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> three, <S%G5140><s%> think <S%G1380><s%> you, was neighbor <S%G4139><s%> to him that fell <S%G1706><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the thieves? <S%G3027><s%>

And he said, <S%G2036><s%> He that showed <S%G4160><s%> mercy <S%G1656><s%> on <S%G3326><s%> him. Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> to him, Go, <S%G4198><s%> and do <S%G4160><s%> you likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, as they went, <S%G4198><s%> that he entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> village: <S%G2968><s%> and a certain <S%G5100><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Martha <S%G3136><s%> received <S%G5264><s%> him into <S%G1519><s%> her house. <S%G3624><s%>

And she had <S%G1510><s%> a sister <S%G79><s%> called <S%G2564><s%> Mary, <S%G3137><s%> which also <S%G2532><s%> sat <S%G3869><s%> at <S%G3844><s%> Jesus' <S%G2424><s%> feet, <S%G4228><s%> and heard <S%G191><s%> his word. <S%G3056><s%>

But Martha <S%G3136><s%> was encumbered <S%G4049><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> serving, <S%G1248><s%> and came <S%G2186><s%> to him, and said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> do you not care <S%G3199><s%> that my sister <S%G79><s%> has left <S%G2641><s%> me to serve <S%G1247><s%> alone? <S%G3441><s%> bid <S%G2036><s%> her therefore <S%G3767><s%> that she help <S%G4878><s%> me.

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to her, Martha, <S%G3136><s%> Martha, <S%G3136><s%> you are careful <S%G3309><s%> and troubled <S%G5182><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things:

But one <S%G1520><s%> thing is needful: <S%G5532><s%> and Mary <S%G3137><s%> has chosen <S%G1586><s%> that good <S%G18><s%> part, <S%G3310><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall not be taken <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> from her.
